Name: Statuette of a porter
Description: The statuette represents a standing man holding a sack on his shoulders. He wears a knee-long garment and a wig covering his ears. The body is painted red, the whites and the garment are white, the wig, brows, eyelids and pupils are black. The statuette of a porter originally was a part of a model of a granary that could include the scenes of bringing and measuring corn.
